summary: A librarian takes a cruise and falls for an unobtainable man, a district attorney married to a crippled woman.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Adolphe Menjou|Ralph Bellamy|Dorothy Peterson|Thomas Jefferson|Myrna Fresholt|Charlotte Henry|Oliver Eckhardt|Henry Armetta|Jessie Arnold|Wilson Benge|Roger Byrne|Nora Cecil|Jack Chefe|Lynn Compton|Larry Dolan|Bill Elliott|Mary Jo Ellis|Bess Flowers|Robert Graves|Sherry Hall|Chuck Hamilton|Halliwell Hobbes|Harry Holman|Arthur Hoyt|Carmencita Johnson|Seessel Anne Johnson|Eddie Kane|Fred Kelsey|Claude King|Edward LeSaint|Margaret Mann|Leila McIntyre|Charles Middleton|Edmund Mortimer|Wilfred Noy|William H. O'Brien|Spec O'Donnell|Helen Parrish|Robert Parrish|Gertrude Pedlar|Cooke Phelps|Matty Roubert|Helen Stuart|Harry Todd|Ford West|Dick Winslow|Florence Wix
director: Director: Frank Capra (as Frank R. Capra)
title: Amor prohibido
